# Microsoft DNS Challenge (DNSMOS)

This repository vendors the following artifacts from Microsoft DNS Challenge for **offline** NS benchmarking:

- DNSMOS (SIG/BAK/OVR) ONNX model:
  - Source: https://github.com/microsoft/DNS-Challenge/tree/master/DNSMOS
  - File copied from: `DNSMOS/DNSMOS/sig_bak_ovr.onnx`
  - Local path: `benchmarks/ns_chime7_udase/models/dnsmos/sig_bak_ovr.onnx`

Licenses:
- `LICENSE` (CC BY 4.0)
- `LICENSE-CODE` (MIT)

References:
- DNSMOS paper: https://arxiv.org/pdf/2010.15258.pdf
- DNSMOS P.835 paper: https://arxiv.org/pdf/2110.01763.pdf
